Title: Object: Papyrus Anastasi 7
Description: Papyrus Anastasi VII; sheet 5; Hieratic text - Hymn to the Inundation.
Curator's comments: For edition of the Hymn to the Inundation: W. Helck, Der Text des "Nilhymnus", KÄT, Wiesbaden 1972; D. van der Plas, L'Hymne à la crue du Nil, EU 4, Leiden 1986, passim und Bd. II, 158-161. This manuscript is available on T.L.A (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/) Translation: M. Lichtheim, Ancient Egyptian Literature. Volume I: The Old and Middle Kingdoms, Berkeley, Los Angeles, London, 1973 (=1975), 204-210. col 9 Hymn to the Inundation = ed Helck 5b-8b col 10 Hymn to the Inundation = ed Helck 8b-10e
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381206) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381206)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Red ink Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: leather (deteriorated), 3m scotch magic tape 810 Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
